history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I want I want to go to the airport.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 09:12 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 13 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Morewood avenue far side . </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER That mean you're interested.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh International airport lower level.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 9:25am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
